title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Case-Based Design for Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design concepts and smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three behavioral characteristics of learners that arise when designing TEL in smartphone-centric technological environments.
Learners can propose at least two technology integration strategies considering learner types and social contexts when designing language learning tasks.
Learners can develop formative assessment tools to evaluate learners' technology utilization patterns using qualitative case study methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
